channel.title: Need help with my shops on my server!
channel.description: Everytime an item has been bought from my shops, instead of the prices goin up, they go down....making it able to buy an item cheaper when there is less quantity. I want it the other way around, I'm tryin to get it where when the shop has less quantity of an item the price either goes up or stays the same....Can any1 help ?

item.title: Need help with my shops on my server!
item.dc:creator: @xXOwnage xXOwnage
item.description:

Everytime an item has been bought from my shops, instead of the prices goin up, they go down…making it able to buy an item cheaper when there is less quantity.
I want it the other way around, I’m tryin to get it where when the shop has less quantity of an item the price either goes up or stays the same…Can any1 help ?
